'''Fourth's a Deathmatch''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] in [[Chinvat Ravine]], [[Avidya Forest]], [[Sumeru]]. It is time-gated over 5 in real life days (4 server resets).

==Steps==
* All steps occur at the following hilichurl camp, southeast of [[Sumeru City]]:
:<gallery>
Location Fourth's a Deathmatch.png|Hilichurl camp location
Location Fourth's a Deathmatch Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>
===Day 1===
# Defeat the enemies: {{Enemy List|Wooden Shield Mitachurl;Hilichurl Fighter*2;Dendro Samachurl;Pyro Slime}}

=== Day 2 ===
# Defeat the enemies: {{Enemy List|Crackling Axe Mitachurl;Hilichurl Fighter*2;Anemo Samachurl;Pyro Slime}}

=== Day 3 ===
# Defeat the enemies: {{Enemy List|Blazing Axe Mitachurl;Hilichurl Fighter*2;Geo Samachurl;Pyro Slime}}

===Day 4===
# Defeat the enemies: {{Enemy List|Stonehide Lawachurl;Hilichurl Berserker*2;Hydro Samachurl;Pyro Slime}}

===Day 5===
# An [[Exquisite Chest]] will be available to open

==Gameplay Notes==
* Four torches can be found in front of the hilichurl hut. One of these torches will be lit, indicating the player's current progress in the Hidden Exploration Objective. For example, if the second torch from the left is lit, the player is on the Day 2. On Day 5, all four torches will be lit.
